ingredients.ingredient: 4 cloves garlic, chopped, or to taste
1 pound jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined
3 tablespoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)
1 tablespoon crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste
½ cup Alfredo sauce, or as needed (Optional)

cookingTips: Cook pasta until al dente, then toss with shrimp mixture rather than draining completely
Old Bay seasoning provides spice complexity that complements creamy Alfredo
Add red pepper flakes gradually to control heat level
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This dish marries classic Alfredo creaminess with bold Old Bay spice and heat. Guide the cook to balance these competing flavors by tasting and adjusting seasoning incrementally.
